replies.body:
There's no difference, consider any female wearing low cut top to show boobs will get more subs on twitch than a random in challenger. You will get a fancy skin thou, and the streamer gets maybe $50k p/a from ads and sponsorship while playing games?

Sorry for revealing industry secrets. Don't believe it? Here's a link. Yw for the cleavage.
https://www.google.com.au/search?q=female+streamers&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0CAcQ_AUoAWoVChMI6Y-FqsK2yAIVhN2mCh1qUAL8&biw=1428&bih=754

But tbh, **there's a big difference**, they don't have the complete rune sets, even if you put under 30s vs unranked 30s they will still be at a disadvantage due to the runes. You all have seen people running away with 100 hp, if a player with full page of AP (which stacks up to +36 AP) combined with a medium range scaling of 60% AP skills (ie Lissandra Q) you dish out 22 more damage per Q compared to another level 29 person on the same champion, who may not have one bit of AP because they brought Gnar instead of runes and decided it's not for them, should the two stand next to each other and facebash with their Q, the one with better rune page will come out on top.

> There's no difference, consider any female wearing low cut top to show boobs will get more subs on twitch than a random in challenger. You will get a fancy skin thou, and the streamer gets maybe $50k p/a from ads and sponsorship while playing games?

No idea if your whole comment makes sense or not BUT thanks for the cleavage lmao
Titties makes the world a better place for sure
It's a norm, it happens, get over yourself ♥
I'm more having a joke<3 I aint even mad
You won anyway, I hope your having a laugh and besides, this game is for fun. If you were serious over this game you would have a rank.
Its not even you playing though dude, unless you have an alternate account. If it isn't you it could be a customer yeah?
Sorry man, custom game Haha, not customer. Auto correct -_-

hmm... Who won?


tbh, in terms of skill, unranked is generally mid silver, below thirty is generally high bronze or low silver, and diamond OCE players are usually platinum NA players.
The Cass just afked after a few mins so they plowed through till 20

lollll I was being sarcastic, I think we both know who would've won even if cass didn't AFK, based on the amount of wins each player had while assuming they all don't have a ridiculous amount of losses to compensate or something.
That's the worst case of matchmaking I have ever seen.

Not quite, I say this because they are all unranked and could be a high MMR where as the other 5 (one's with a rank) could have a lower MMR in normals Since Ranked and normals have different MMR setting. Unranked could be bronze to world class because they have no rank does not mean their shit they might not just take LoL seriously and only play for the fun, not for the rank.
